title: What is the average wage in Kuwait? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends, If you’re kuwaiti in the governement sector it’ll be around 1,000–2,000 kuwaiti dinars which is avoht 6,000 usd monthly If you’re not it depends on where you work, where you’re from (nationality), your credentials (degree), and whether you’re in the private or public sector (private get paid more, with exceptions). Wages for foreigners vary widely, but are probably above average when compared to arab counterparts, but probably less than gulf neighbors like uae.

As per the market the average wage in Kuwait is from 150KD to 450KD at an entry level with a valid degree. Managers earn more than 1000KD followed by the leads who earn around 400KD to 800KD. And it again depends on the nationality. If you are a Western country citizen, then you start earning at a very high wage compared to your counterparts who are mostly from south east Asia.
